/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering power lines, creating a vibrant contrast against the clear blue sky dotted with fluffy white clouds. On the right side of the road, a large overpass stretches across the frame, adding an architectural element to the landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the overpass, making them appear as if they are reaching towards the sky. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
